name: Surely, Rendezvous the Iris
description:
Made in about 3 days. Just a simple and quick 'tech demo' for a 2d framework in Ren'Py. I think it's cool.

It works thru simple coordinates, i.e. changing a dot's offset with keys on a screen. Still need to work on doors and walls and such, but it's okay for now.

Neat.
